dict.acceptation: 用皮革包盖；（口）（用皮带等）抽打；制成皮，蒙上皮；

sent.orig: Business Scope: pig skin finished leather, pigskin garment leather, sofa leather, pigskin leather, corner leather.
sent.trans: 经营范围：猪皮成品革、猪皮服装革、沙发革、猪皮里革、角皮。

sent.orig: Leather Clothes, Leather Jackets Leather Bags. Bags and Luggage-Leather.
sent.trans: 采购产品皮革衣服，皮具夹克，皮革袋子。袋子和行李-皮革。

sent.orig: Bags and Luggage-Leather, Leather Goods and Accessories Leather Goods:-Belts, Handbags, Backpacks.
sent.trans: 采购产品袋子和行李-皮革，皮具货物和配件，皮革货物：-带子，手提包，背包。

sent.orig: Gifts Articles, Labels, Stickers and Tags, Leather Goods and Accessories, Gifts, Leather Apparel, Leather Goods.
sent.trans: 采购产品礼品，标签，标签和标签，皮革货物和配件，礼物，皮革衣服，皮革货物。

sent.orig: Readymade Garments, Leather Garment, Athletic Wear, Leather Apparel, Leather Goods, Sportswear.
sent.trans: 采购产品成衣，皮革衣服，运动衣，皮革衣服，皮具商品，运动装。
